title: 🔍 谷歌AI：谷歌 Fastest and Most Cost-Effective AI Model Is Generally Available
original_title: Google's Fastest and Most Cost-Effective AI Model Is Generally Available
description: The stable variant of the Gemini 2.5 Flash-Lite is now 可用, and 成本 $0.1 and $0.4 per million 输入 and 输出 令牌, 分别.
original_description: The stable variant of the Gemini 2.5 Flash-Lite is now available, and costs $0.1 and $0.4 per million input and output tokens, respectively.

title: 📰 AI资讯：软银, Stargate 瞄准 小型 数据中心
original_title: SoftBank, Stargate eye small data center
description: STARGATE, a multibillion-dollar effort by ChatGPT’s creator OpenAI, SoftBank and Oracle to supercharge US 人工智能 (AI) ambitions, is now setting the more modest goal of building a small data center by the end of the year, likely in Ohio, the Wall Street Journal reported on Monday.
original_description: STARGATE, a multibillion-dollar effort by ChatGPT’s creator OpenAI, SoftBank and Oracle to supercharge US artificial intelligence (AI) ambitions, is now setting the more modest goal of building a small data center by the end of the year, likely in Ohio, the Wall Street Journal reported on Monday.

title: 🔍 谷歌AI：微软 挖角 谷歌 DeepMind AI 人才 as it 加强 Copilot

original_description: Microsoft's artificial intelligence group has been growing under Mustafa Suleyman, a co-founder of the DeepMind research lab Google acquired years ago.

title: 📰 AI资讯：Humans 击败 AI 金牌 得分 at top 数学 竞赛
original_title: Humans beat AI gold-level score at top math contest
description: SYDNEY, Australia — Humans beat generative 人工智能 (AI) 模型s made by 谷歌 and OpenAI at a top international mathematics competition, despite the programs reaching gold-level scores for the first time.
original_description: SYDNEY, Australia — Humans beat generative artificial intelligence (AI) models made by Google and OpenAI at a top international mathematics competition, despite the programs reaching gold-level scores for the first time.

title: 💰 投资动态：Composio Raises $25 Million to Help AI Agents Learn from Experience
original_title: Composio Raises $25 Million to Help AI Agents Learn from Experience

original_description: Agentic artificial intelligence (AI) startup Composio has secured $25 million in Series A funding led by Lightspeed Venture Partners, bringing its total funding to $29 million.

title: 📰 AI资讯：AI 设备 can '翻译' your 梦境 and play them back for you
original_title: AI device can 'translate' your dreams and play them back for you
description: Dutch design studio Modem has introduced its latest project, Dream Recorder. Aptly named, the device allows 用户 to see visual interpretations of their own dreams by harnessing the latest in 技术 — a video AI 模型 that translates phrases into pictures.
original_description: Dutch design studio Modem has introduced its latest project, Dream Recorder. Aptly named, the device allows users to see visual interpretations of their own dreams by harnessing the latest in technology — a video AI model that translates phrases into pictures.
